resources.string: This project is done for \n ITEC 4550 Course Project
Scores for the Snake Game \n This Scores will store the name and socre and saved\n on online or local DB
settings for the snake game \n such as changing snake color or food colors or maybe speed of the snake for more dificulty

This Game has 2 versions of how to play
 Classic: Just like old times classsic Snake game trying to get
 the snake as big as possible by not eating yourself 
you may use the
 buttons for movement.
 Score Game: Try to bet yourself or others by having
 the greates score possible until the snake is eaten
